channel.title: 2.2.0b + 2.2.0c Mini Patch Notes (LIVE)
channel.description:
# v2.2.0c
> April 3rd : Bug Fixes
* Fixed Mystic/General tabs being 80% unclickable due to a hidden layer. * Hid the King's "white box" nothing-abilities. * Fixed a specific bleeding text feedback that was not formatted.
# v2.2.0b
> March 31st : Bug FIxes
* Fixed infinite-collapsing UI caused by a faulty cam shake (bleed+death) that would temporarily mess up the camera. * Fixed "Queue as Group" that was not reserving slots for your friends.
___ These two patches are not included in the in-game patch notes.

item.title: 2.2.0b + 2.2.0c Mini Patch Notes (LIVE)
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
v2.2.0c

April 3rd : Bug Fixes

  • Fixed Mystic/General tabs being 80% unclickable due to a hidden layer.
  • Hid the King’s “white box” nothing-abilities.
  • Fixed a specific bleeding text feedback that was not formatted.

v2.2.0b

March 31st : Bug FIxes

  • Fixed infinite-collapsing UI caused by a faulty cam shake (bleed+death) that would temporarily mess up the camera.
  • Fixed “Queue as Group” that was not reserving slots for your friends.

These two patches are not included in the in-game patch notes.
